function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close human interaction and contact","Impact":"Spread of disease, potential for widespread infection","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, testing and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Computer vision for crowd monitoring, AI for disease spread prediction","People":"General public, individuals in crowded spaces, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate training data for human detection model","Impact":"Low accuracy and effectiveness of the model in detecting and identifying humans","Mitigation":"Curating diverse and representative datasets, data augmentation and synthetic data generation","Technologies":"Data augmentation tools, synthetic data generation algorithms","People":"AI researchers, developers, data scientists","Owner":"AI research institutions, companies developing human detection models"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the geometric transformation and mapping in the context of computer vision","Impact":"Inaccurate mapping of world coordinates to image points, leading to errors in human detection and tracking","Mitigation":"Thorough understanding of camera intrinsic matrix, rotation matrix, and translation matrix, rigorous testing and validation of transformation algorithms","Technologies":"Computer vision algorithms for geometric transformation, testing and validation frameworks","People":"Computer vision researchers, developers, engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, companies developing computer vision technology"}]}
